description: NOTE: The case only fits the Fire Hd 7 2012 inch Tablet. It will NOT fit 2013 All New Fire HD 7 Tablet, or ANY OTHER Amazon tablet.Custom designed for your precious Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7 inch tablet, this case features a combination of functionality and style. Well built to protect your Kindle Fire HD 7 tablet for the years to come.Ultra slim lightweight hardback adds minimal bulk while protecting your Kindle Fire HD 7 .The premium PU leather boosts a classy look.The no-scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection.Built-in stand with two angles: perfect whenever you type an email or watch a movie.Access to all controls and features.Smart cover auto sleep/wake feature.Magnetic closure.This product is sold exclusively by BSCstore. Only buy from BSCstore to get genuine MoKo(TM) products with Lifetime warranty and superb customer service.
title: MoKo(TM) Ultra-Lightweight SlimShell Standing Case for Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7" inch Tablet, BLACK--Lifetime Warranty
